author: jdhitsolutions
body: First off I want to say well done for such a tremendous undertaking. For those of us who have not been with the party since it started, and so that I can help frame expectations and shape the narrative I would be very interested to know what main PowerShell features that we've come to expect in the Windows world, that will NOT be a part of the initial alpha for Linux and OSX platforms. These would be features that you expect to officially support but will not initially be available.  Or at least I would hope you would include this material in any release notes.

comments.author: jdhitsolutions
comments.body: Thanks. That's what I was looking for. I would not have thought to drill that far down to find it. I'm trusting that this information will be at the top of the public release.

title: Alpha Expectations
